name: Concord Assault
description:
If you wish to support further development please consider naming a price when downloading the windows or android builds of this game!


keybinds:

Arrow keys to move
B: overcharge - shoots three shots
V: missile barrage - fires a volley of seeking missiles to take out the nearest enemies
C:  spinal purge - fires a laser for 4 seconds that on contact with something wipes the screen of enemy ships.
